scripts.preinstall:
CHECK="$(dpkg -l | grep libgit2-27 2>/dev/null)"; if [ -z "$CHECK" ]; then echo 'Machine global peer dependency "nodegit" is required. Checking for libgit2...
'; if ! [ $(id -u) = 0 ]; then echo "Must be root to run script"; fi && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive sudo apt-get install -yqq libgit2-27 openssl; else echo 'nodegit is installed.'; fi
